label: AB3_oP24_59_ae_befg-001
title: $\beta$-NbPd$_{3}$ Structure
comments:
Although $\beta$-NbPd$_{3}$ and $\alpha$-NbPd$_{3}$, which has the \href{current_web_home_dir/A3B_tI8_139_ad_b-001}{$D0_{22}$ structure}, coexist over a wide range of temperatures, it is thought that $\alpha$-NbPd$_{3}$ is the ground state (Chandrasekharaiah, 1988). 
 (Giessen, 1964) state that their coordinates are given in the $Pmmn$ setting of space group \#59, but it is apparent that they actually use the $Pmnm$ setting.  We transformed this to $Pmmn$.
